author: parithosh
content:
The testing call is set to happen at 2PM UTC. Please use the link here: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/86466169680?pwd=x17cbD1lDCeQEWMTTOLARQhELiJV21.1

We're going to be discussing the updates to EIP-7702 as well as EIP-7840: 
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9248
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9250
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9240 (discussion here: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1328758525979262986)

So it would be great if EL teams would show up for the call or send in their opinions async beforehand.

author: parithosh
content: Notes from the testing call can be found here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/client-testing-call-21-january-20-2025/22591
